meta.label: Regression Splines
meta.description: Split the variable into [B-spline basis](https://patsy.readthedocs.io/en/latest/spline-regression.html), which parametrizes a piecewise polynomial spline where pieces meet at each knot

outputRoles.name: output_dataset
outputRoles.label: Output Dataset
outputRoles.description: The dataset will have additional columns representing the basis of the bspline decomposition, the number of columns added is equal to number of knots plus the degree of the polynomial

params.name: column_name
params.label: Column Name
params.description: The input column upon which the regression spline will be built

params.name: knots
params.label: Knots
params.description: The knots of the regression spline, ie the points where the pieces of the piecewise polynomial meet

params.name: degree
params.label: Degree
params.description: The degree of each piecewise polynomial, should be between 0 and 3
